content.question: In context, the narrator’s statement in the second paragraph that Reena “had not changed” primarily serves to emphasize the

choices.label: dissatisfaction that Reena feels despite her beauty
comfort that Reena and the narrator find in familiar routines
powerful effect that Reena still has on the narrator
cruelty that Reena shows toward the narrator even as an adult

content.answer: powerful effect that Reena still has on the narrator

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
